Summary: Transparent oval shaped baloon like thing
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and 2 kids along with my brother and sister in-law climbed to the top of stone mountain mid day one nvember week-end of 2010.when they reached the top my brother decided to lay down to relax as he was looking upward to the sky with his shades on. he then saw what he thought was a transparent baloon approaching approximately around 3 feet in diameter slowly hovering towards him at about at a fairly close range\height.he described it as transparent where you can see through it, almost like a chameleon like effect like in predator the movie but still see the outline.once it got above him it suddenly shot eastward at a high rate of speed as it turned into a dot in seconds until he could no longer see it. wife my has footgae of them being there as you can see my brother laying on his back then suddenly point to the sky but unfortunately my wife did not catch on to what my brother was getting excited about and never focused the camcorder upward to see what he was pointing to.there where other people around but since happened it was mid day everyone was looking to see the view of atlanta instead of looking into the sky plus the sun light beaming downward probably desguised the object from being seen.
